g-0: ^I'm looking for medicine to give to Ulrich.
^He sent me here... I think? He's tough to decipher.
^Ha! Old Ulrich giving you a hard time? Don't worry, you've come to the right place.
^I make him a nasal spray out of some special algae we forage around here.
^I could whip you up a batch right now, but I'll need a favor in return!
g-1: ^I'm game. What do you need help with?
^I collected some seashells earlier, but they're all muddy.
^I meant to clean them up myself, but why do that when I can have someone do it for me, right? Ha!
g-2: ^I'll take care of that for you, then.
